alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 4:36AM CDT until June 12 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 436 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Skellytown to 8 miles northwest of Codman to 7 miles southeast of Lora, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Canadian, Miami, Glazier, Lake Marvin and Lora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
